website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Alpha 5000 is an affordable mirrorless camera that delivers excellent images, but advanced shooters are going to feel limited by its control system.
cons: Inconvenient access to some shooting settings

customer_reviews.title: Great camera and size!
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera! It's my first upgrade from a point and shoot. I didn't want to go too fancy for my first "real" camera, so this was a good intermediary. The size is my favorite part, it's compact, but had the option of larger lenses, not just the one it comes with. It's light and I traveled around Europe with it and it takes amazing pictures! It was not a burden to carry around and overall I've been pleased with it. I even has small info things that you can read about each setting and what it is best used for etc. which as an 'amateur' who knows very little about camera settings, it's very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Sybil Trelawny

customer_reviews.title: Quality shooting on a budget. Only slight complaints are ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality shooting on a budget. Only slight complaints are ones to do with video recording. I bought this mainly for use to record youtube videos. The fact that video length is limited is a slight pain.But the larger annoyances are no external microphone jack, and not even having a shoe adapter means that in order to record, I have to have a USB microphone and laptop handy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Super easy to use and learn with, takes great pictures and manual mode is easy with being able to change the functions of buttons to customize it to you! Follow me on Instagram to see more : dangalla
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: I love this Camera.
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this camera. I had a Nikon DSLR and I sold it and down graded to this one. Greatest decision. I am pretty sure I take better pictures now. It is easy to use. I love that I can send pictures to my phone! I suggest buying a warrantee because 3 months after I bought it, I dropped it and the lens no longer works. I just bought another lens.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B Harding

customer_reviews.title: I also loved the fact that it had a reversible LCD screen ...
customer_reviews.text: I needed a more compact digital camera so that I could take on trips instead of bringing my heavy dslr, so I found this camera. I also loved the fact that it had a reversible LCD screen so that you can take good selfies. Also I believe there is a way to connect via wifi to send the photos to your phone, so that was a huge convenience and plus for me. This camera takes amazing photos, very dslr like. The video recording is also pretty good quality, though the recording sound quality is very loud.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: This has to be my favorite vlog camera I’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: This has to be my favorite vlog camera I’ve bought. And my only vlog camera I’ll every buy. The pros’s -flip up screen -comes with a 16-50 mm zoom lens - small enough to bring to concerts and events - 20 megs of good quality footage Cons No microphone input No horseshoe bay Volume on camera with speaker is low Other then that for a higher quality vlog can under a 500$ budget it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: JosieJayD

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: I had been very hesitant in busy a camera considering everyone does phone pictures now. But I am so happy that I did. The pictures have turned out amazing and the fact that I can take a selfie makes it even better. My family pictures will be great from now on. It doesn't take much time to turn on like others and the zoom feature works wonders
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this camera! It gives the convenience of a point and shoot, with the option to get more detailed for more experienced photography. It's light weight, and very aesthetically pleasing. Great camera for someone who wants to take pictures of their family, travels, or for youtube videos. I've attached pictures of our recent visit to Animal Kingdom.
customer_reviews.author: The Domesticated Mess

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I bought the camera for traveling purposes, I am not a fan of having to take pictures with my phone and have limited storage available. After an extensive research on the camera I decided to purchase it and it was not bad, I like the size, the weigh and the quality of the images are good. I took it on a road trip and it was very convenient, I also used it at a MLS soccer game at night and the images where very good. Overall a good camera but only for simple uses if you are looking for a high utility and high uses I would suggest purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy n Reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Items arrived per descriptions and on schedule. With 2 batteries, 4GB SD card and camera case. Camera is functioning. Good buy for this price. Minor defects here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chan

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great and for a beginner like myself it wasn't difficult to figure it out. The product comes in with a manual, batter, sling, and usb cord the memory and bag you have to purchase it separately. I have been using this to take beauty shots for instagram and so far im loving it. It has different settings to which allows you to customize your camera but the best one for me is the intelligent auto which detects set up and adjust everything for me. which makes my life so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Hmubyemz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent entry level camera
customer_reviews.text: Compact mirror less design with interchangeable Sony e mount lenses. Aperture, Shutter priority, manual and auto settings. Great photo quality. Excellent macro focusing and brilliant colors as seen in the two photos.
customer_reviews.author: James Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Still working great! Love using the camera and love that it ...
customer_reviews.text: Still working great! Love using the camera and love that it has the flip screen so that you can use it as a vlogging camera or to take bomb instagram selfies! Would definitely recommend the battery life lasts long and the camera is super easy to use and setup. Love that you can download the sony app to your smartphone and use as a remote to take pictures from the camera. I bought this refurbished and it still works fine
customer_reviews.author: Tia-Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I am a novice so I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I am a novice so I can't really speak on the specs of it. But as an amateur, It's awesome. The pictures are clear there are a whole bunch of settings that help you take a great shot. Doing the panoramic shot is difficult however because it is highly sensitive to movement. Took it on a trip to Bolivia and am more than happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Siren

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. I have used Canon my entire life and have recently wanted to switch over to Sony, so I bought this as an entry level Sony camera. It's great, does a great job and very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Thompson - Nor Cal

customer_reviews.title: Maybe I got a bad camera?
customer_reviews.text: This camera was pretty awful. I needed it for close ups, photos of people and inventory for my online stores. It would take 5 minutes to focus on something. With flash, the picture would be completely white. Without flash, so dark with weird warm tones. I changed a lot of modes on this camera to try to figure it out. Coming from a DSLR Nikon, I would never buy this again. Switched to Canon rebel5i and in love.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: love love love this camera great quality pictures
customer_reviews.text: love love love this camera great quality pictures, easy to use and easy to transfer would recommend this for anyone wanting a new camera
customer_reviews.author: Noel Tullis

customer_reviews.title: Lens stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I loved the camera until in the middle of a once in a lifetime vacation, the lens stopped working while I was taking a picture of a sunrise. Need I say more? I only had it for a little over 2 yrs. Unlike this digital camera, my 35mm camera has lasted for 40 yrs and is still working.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Purchased to take video with microscope
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera to record video while attached to my trinocular microscope and it works well for me. I’m also satisfied with the video it takes of the macroscopic world.
customer_reviews.author: A Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Camera
customer_reviews.text: Camera came exactly as expected and was perfectly packaged. After using the camera for a month I am very happy with my purchase. Photos come out crisp and professional looking. Look up tips on the internet to see how to use the camera to take great photos. Great purchase, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect camera, it was exactly what I wanted, a very good photo, with lots of effects, the convenience to carry everywhere because it is small, has wifi, that I just loved, and to finish its LCD turns 180 degrees in order to take selfies. Even though I have bought it used, the camera seems new.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Macedo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So far a great product, have just started with photos and really looks promising. Was disappointed in not receiving a booklet on how to use the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Trent

customer_reviews.title: not great at color accuracy in low light
customer_reviews.text: not great at color accuracy in low light, Not the best at iso over ~ 6000,8000 gets very grainy. But other than that it will take AMAZING shots. At night, i just am forced to use low appature and/or longer exposure .
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: i love this camera
customer_reviews.text: came back a year later to say that I love this camera more than life. so easy to use, the app that you can download onto your phone or iPad makes shooting self-portraits easy as cake and you can immediately edit your photos for those super demanding customers.
customer_reviews.author: Grae

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use, i love it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera! Records in beautiful HD, easy to use and the flip screen feature is super convenient. It's lightweight so it's to take anywhere when traveling. I bought this camera quite a while ago?? Maybe it's a year or two old and it's still works like new.
customer_reviews.author: Raeven

customer_reviews.title: No on camera timer? Still great.
customer_reviews.text: Good pics, great camera. Very versatile. No timer had to download app for ipad/phone and worked wonderfully. Still, on camera timer seems like a major flaw no brainer... But works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't regret your purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pictures, colors are so vibrant, great clearity, easy to use. Still have lots to learn, but I'm enjoying the use of my new camera. One of my favorite things about the camera is the wifi connection. So easy to share with my phone and computer. Once they are on my phone I'm able to share with the person I've photographed.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Responsive seller and good product.  Great camera at fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Sony A5000 camera at a discount because it was preowned. Upon opening, I noticed it did not come with the correct cord. I contacted seller and they more than made up for this by sending me brand new cords and a 32 GB SD card. I’m very pleased with the camera and the transaction with this seller. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for vlogging with but if you are using ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for vlogging with but if you are using it for extended period of time 30 minutes or longer it will stop working because the internal temp gets too high. You have to wait for it to cool down before using again which is annoying if you are mid filming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The seller did not have black so gave me white instead, which is fine. It did not come with a lens cap or USB cord from this seller, although they provide a battery and battery charge, and a memory card and memory card reader. I did have to buy a lens cap, but otherwise i was satisfied and it shipped and arrived on time, the seller contacted me to let me know about the color change and they were polite about that. The screen protectors they provided were worthless, but the rest of the equipment works (bag, mini-tripod, memory card reader, battery charger). It was still a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Was expensive but worth of the money can't even tell you how much I love the pictures this camera does! What's your eyes see the camera shows it exactly! But sadly the lenses are very expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Rougui

customer_reviews.title: Return policy from the company sucks
customer_reviews.text: Mickey mouse club camera, get something nicer. Return policy from the company sucks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He is so happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 15 year old son for a birthday present. He is so happy with this camera. He has not put it down since he got it. It is real easy to operate. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great photos, simple to use
customer_reviews.text: Great photos, simple to use. The apps are not always the most simple to use, but the camera itself is great and I'm very happy with it. I mostly take dog and camping photos :)
customer_reviews.author: Emily E. Baehr

customer_reviews.title: Good Video & Pics; Sound can be kinda messy
customer_reviews.text: This camera has great video and picture quality. Overall I think it is very nice but the sounds on the video can get muffled and also sometimes has a shaking noise. Other than that I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: I thinks it's a pretty great camera that takes great photos
customer_reviews.text: I thinks it's a pretty great camera that takes great photos. I'm a beginner so I'm not sure about all the features or how to use them but so far I've enjoyed using the camera.
customer_reviews.author: Yemi K.

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb camera.....the picture quality is the best and it is easy to work and has numerous settings. The only knock on it is that when you are outside it is hard to see the screen in the glare. But the quality is so good that you can shoot many pictures and get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: GAP

customer_reviews.title: This is a great camera for the price that I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera for the price that I bought it. The camera it self has great quality, however I like it better with the app that I downloaded onto it. The one in the middle is without the app and the two on the outside are with the app.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great transition camera
customer_reviews.text: Great transition camera. It's been a while since I lost my DLRS so I wanted to give this camera a try. good features and easy to use. Need to test it in poor light conditions. I love the fact you can take selfies thanks to the pivoted screen.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Delgado

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love my camera!! Lense went out a year later but overall great quality camera!
customer_reviews.author: Terra

customer_reviews.title: beautiful photos
customer_reviews.text: Took excellent photos on my trip to Italy. I returned for the a7000 though. beautiful silver color. if you're looking for a photo in this price range, can't be beat. I'll upload photos soon.
customer_reviews.author: SNB

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: It got here quick and is just what I ordered. So far I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I really love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really love this camera. It takes great pictures, and the size is so much better to handle than DSLRs (which is what I was considering before purchasing this). The only complaint I have is the lens cap, which is small and is not attached to the camera in any way which makes it easy to lose.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and gives results equivalent to my Nikon digital SLR but it is smaller and lighter so it is very easy to carry wherever I go. I love this camera.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The camera lasted for just over a year, when ...
customer_reviews.text: The camera lasted for just over a year , when the screen started turning on and off every few seconds. i tried all the techniques Sony CS gave to try and fix the issue , nothing helped. The warranty is expired and now im stuck with this POS.
customer_reviews.author: Eli D

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Good camera and a really good customer service. There was an scratch in the inside part of the lens crown hat was not mentioned in the description, but product was working correctly and in really good conditions
customer_reviews.author: José Francisco Dunzz Rodríguez

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, You Will Not Be Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for my son. He loves it and it takes wonderfully sharp photos. You will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Harris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never to late to give a good comment. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Gabrielli

customer_reviews.title: ... didn’t come with a lens as described I’m so disappointed!! This never happened to me on amazon
customer_reviews.text: The product didn’t come with a lens as described I’m so disappointed!! This never happened to me on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The review
customer_reviews.text: 1st. The product: everything worked properly with no problems. Score: 5 2nd the seller: they were a bit difficult to communicate with which in turn i believe slowed my shipping.
customer_reviews.author: joe mac

customer_reviews.title: Great starting camera for photo/video
customer_reviews.text: Great starting camera for both photo and video. Wonderful quality and flip screen. Would recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Fugate

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera very good pics and it’s not to big to carry
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Purchased as a gift
customer_reviews.text: This camera was purchased as a gift for a 13yr old boy who is fairly new at using a camera. His only experience is the camera on his cell phone. He really likes the video quality and says that the camera has a great mic too. He likes how easy it is to operate this camera as well.
customer_reviews.author: D Brown

customer_reviews.title: this camera was a gift and the recipient is enjoying ...
customer_reviews.text: this camera was a gift and the recipient is enjoying it so much i may have to buy one for myself!
customer_reviews.author: DP in WP

customer_reviews.title: Great all around camera
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality = HD Sharing abilities = Easy Battery life = Horrible Recording = Can't record long
customer_reviews.author: Chevel

customer_reviews.title: Fun camera!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first camera other than a phone camera. I am very happy with this purchase! I have a lot to learn but so far so good. Photos are crystal clear. I love the wifi, camera to phone photo transfer, and large tilting screen! It's a very attractive phone and easy to carry. I am ver happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bcondon

customer_reviews.title: When I opened the camera out of the box and ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the camera out of the box and turned on the camera it said "attach lens properly" and I did indeed, but then again it said the same thing over and over
customer_reviews.author: Joe dunn

customer_reviews.title: Initially the Flash pops up but does not fire, ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially the Flash pops up but does not fire, The built-in flash isnot working - it isnot firing too..
customer_reviews.author: Sanjeev Parichha

customer_reviews.title: Vlogger's bestfriend
customer_reviews.text: As a vlogger this camera is an essential, video quality is top notch!( You can check my Youtube channel thefoodiefeed for reference) Very handy and has a flip screen, also takes rad photos! WiFi feature is also very useful. Audio is very clear and battery life is also decent.
customer_reviews.author: thefoodiefeed

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I'm thrilled with this camera. Took it on our Honeymoon and took the most beautiful pictures. I'm an amateur photographer and found this camera very easy to navigate.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera, takes great photos. The back screen flipping is really great.
customer_reviews.author: arttoeveryone

customer_reviews.title: Problem in Camera Lens
customer_reviews.text: Once already replaced due to lens problem and again having same problem in another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good Camera for vlogging. It captured high quality videos and decent audio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then any Nikon or Canon at this price point
customer_reviews.text: Great budget camera, works with all the Sony Apps, great timelapse apps available, I find it much nicer to use then the bigger Canons and Nikons
customer_reviews.author: Bright Day

customer_reviews.title: I bought this as a gift for my sister who ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister who loves taking pictures ...She is so excited to have it ...She was inspired to enroll in some online classes to learn to take take pictures professionally... She loves the camera
customer_reviews.author: Nahrin Davis

customer_reviews.title: Did a lot of research and glad I ended up with this one
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research and glad I ended up with this one. Small but well built and takes great photos.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this camera. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to replace my Sony a3000 and I have to say that I really do love this camera. I travel a lot and having to carry around my other camera was a pain because it was heavy and bulky. The Sony a5000 is small and light. Not being that experienced with photography and videography, I find that it is very easy to get some really great quality photos and videos. I also love the flip screen. Makes it easier to take group photos with the timer. And I love taking selfies! Would definitly recommend this camera to anyone who is not that experienced with cameras.
customer_reviews.author: Razo

customer_reviews.title: a newbies joy toy
customer_reviews.text: I am new to photography and this camera works just right for me. It's easy to use and I am very happy with the quality of photos. My wife operates a daycare and she loves taking pictures of the projects and beautiful kids. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: peter reid

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: High quality pictures and video. Just the right size to take anywhere. Love the wifi feature to quickly send your images to your phone. The flip up screen comes in handy for self videos.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Carr

customer_reviews.title: This Camera is the best I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: This Camera is the best I have ever owned. It is an awesome Camera and the pictures are amazing Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Saad Arafat

customer_reviews.title: Still figuring out the best mode under each scenario
customer_reviews.text: Very handy camera to create high quality pictures. The features are enough for me compared to the more advanced alpha5100. Still figuring out the best mode under each scenario. The shipping fee is high but it was not packed carefully. I was a little concerned when I first saw the package.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: VLOGGING TIME!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty neat camera I'm excited to start vlogging :D
customer_reviews.author: AnaBanana07

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Sonya5000! I am a Youtuber and recommend anyone who wants to have a good quality camera for a reasonable price that is good for vlogging and specific topic/content or beauty vlogging to invest. This is my baby! The shipping was great as well!
customer_reviews.author: MissMosstheBoss

customer_reviews.title: great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for the price, and compact too! Only wish they made more fully compatible lenses for it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is good for first learner
customer_reviews.text: i am still learning to use it. It is good for first learner. Love it and I usually carry it with me with I go out. especially during winter the iphone always dies unexpectedly.
customer_reviews.author: XIAOYING ZHONG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Totton

customer_reviews.title: My daughter was SO thrilled to receive this camera as ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was SO thrilled to receive this camera as a Christmas gift, which was the first item on her list!! I was SO thrilled that it was about $150. less than what she saw on Target's website!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best one I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Best one I have ever owned, takes better pictures than most of the very bulky cameras in the market
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not the savviest camera user, but I love this camera! It's small but has a big punch! The photo quality is amazing and I love that you can flip the back screen up for selfies. Though, my favorite feature has to be that I can send the pictures directly to my phone - I don't have to upload them to my computer in order to put them online.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I have been looking 7 months for a great camera that was worth investing in but not setting me back for recreational purchasing, plus I'm extremely indecisive lol. My review won't say verified because I wasn't home when it was delivered and had to pick it up from the post office. I received it used in great shape from a previous owner that was very clear cut and specific. I'm leaving pics in hopes that I can help the same way others did when it came to making this great decision.
customer_reviews.author: Lainey

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT +
customer_reviews.text: WOW. Great Camera, love this little thing, As good as my Nikon D5300. Perfect for every day carry. Purchased Tameron 18-200mm lens for wider range of shooting, this is the perfect set up. I don't even touch my DSLR since this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Papa TTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: I love it! I have this product for about a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! I have this product for about a week now and I'm still loving it! Took pictures with it and video in love! It came in 2 days!
customer_reviews.author: kazoua

customer_reviews.title: My new digital camera.
customer_reviews.text: Great, amazing what they can put into a small, lightweight package. Great for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Limbach

customer_reviews.title: Such a bomb camera 4 YouTube
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to this camera stuff but I have a YouTube channel ChantelJ my latest video had such awesome quality and it has a beauty blur feature that really smoothes you out I've also taken some photos that have awesome clarity
customer_reviews.author: Chant3lj

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and takes amazing pictures. I am in the design business and ...
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and takes amazing pictures. I am in the design business and will you this camera for product shots too. It's that cool.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this camera, it's exactly what I wanted and the shipping was insanely fast!
customer_reviews.author: Edmarys

customer_reviews.title: sony Alpha a5000 camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pic, and short videos at a fair price

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera for the price. Flip up camera is great for vogging!

customer_reviews.title: Takies great photos every time
customer_reviews.text: Takies great photos every time. The image stabilisation and degree of detail is impressive. Can be used on automatic as an idiot camera, or you can use many advanced settings.
customer_reviews.author: PHILLIP E WADE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newbies
customer_reviews.text: As a new photographer, this is a great starters camera. It's light and small enough for me to carry everywhere and takes great pictures.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lens stop working after 2 uses. Can't return out of return window:(

customer_reviews.title: And I'm very pleased. My family loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is my 1st camera. And I'm very pleased. My family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: This camera is the best!! Buy this over a DSLR every day
customer_reviews.text: This camera is the best!! Buy this over a DSLR every day. Same functionality at half the price. Takes amazing pictures and will impress everyone around you. You can take it into places that do not allow professional cameras because without the lens out they think it is digital! Amazing buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: takes better pictures than some higher priced cameras and easy to use but also still learning other features.
customer_reviews.author: Cita Corros

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Takes amazing pictures once you learn how to properly use the camera. Easy to take around, the wifi application makes the camera even better.
customer_reviews.author: Ayja W.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice images. Easy to use. Portable. Great for amateur photographers.
customer_reviews.author: BeeCeeT

customer_reviews.title: Great Mirrorless Camera and Software !
customer_reviews.text: Love this digital camera. Used this on our honeymoon to Paris / London and could not be happier with our photos. I love that the view screen flips for a "selfie" mode that gave us fun ways to capture moments with each other. The SONY PLAY MEMORIES WIFI / BLUETOOTH transfer file system made it SO easy to transfer our favorite photos to our cellphone for a quick facebook/instagram share without having to plug the camera into any computers.
customer_reviews.author: cds

customer_reviews.title: i love this camera
customer_reviews.text: i love this camera! quality is exceptional, size is perfect the standard lens it came with is all you really need. i bought a larger size but rarely use it.
customer_reviews.author: kalman

customer_reviews.title: my daughter is very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is very happy with it. Seems to take good pictures, is very compact so that you can take it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big things in little packages
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think it was much more than a point and shoot. I was wrong. Lots of control, albeit from menus that run deep. Easy ergonomics, good images, easy to grab and go.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Kuhl

product_meta.title: Sony Alpha a5000 Mirrorless Digital Camera with 16-50mm OSS Lens (Black)
product_meta.description:
Style:w/ 16-50mm| Color:Black| Configuration:BaseCapture amazing detail with the 20.1MP camera than anyone can use. with its self-portrait-friendly zoom lever and 180 Degree-tilting screen that lets you see the shots as you take them, this camera makes quality photography look easy. Ready to share these frame-worthy moments with friends? Faster-than-ever wireless sharing with one-touch NFC connectivity lets you upload to Facebook and more, directly from the camera. Ah, simplicity.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 







Capture amazing detail with the 20.1MP Mirrorless camera that is so versatile, it works for both casual photo enthusiasts and professionals. With its self-portrait-friendly zoom lever and 180°-tilting screen that lets you see the shots as you take them, this camera makes quality photography look easy. Plus, share your amazing pictures faster than ever to your social network directly from the camera via WiFi and one-touch NFC connectivity. 




TECHNOLOGY


GO FROM SNAPSHOT TO PHOTOGRAPH
The same sensor format found in other conventional DSLRs is used on the a5000 offering 13x the area of a typical point-and-shoot image sensor. The 20.1MP APS-C sensor delivers an exceptional combination of high resolution, high sensitivity and gorgeous blurred backgrounds to give even simple shots an artistic touch.

SHARE YOUR PHOTOS WITH FRIENDS AND FAMILY INSTANTLY
Wi-Fi connectivity allows you to control your camera with your compatible smartphone or tablet and the PlayMemories Camera Apps5. Frame your shot on your device's LCD, snap the shutter, and then transfer the images directly to your mobile device for quick editing and uploading. And with NFC (near field communication) technology, connecting has never been easier. Simply tap the camera to an NFC-enabled device, and you're ready to shoot and share without wires or hassles.

SHOOT FULL HD MOVIES
Capture HD Movies in your choice of standard 60i or cinematic 24p frames per second, all at Full HD 1920x1080 resolution. The AVCHD codec delivers stunning Blu-ray picture quality while the PC-friendly MP4 codec lets you compress to smaller 1080/30p files for easier upload to the Internet.




BUILT-IN POP-UP FLASH
Perfect when an extra burst of light is needed to get the shot, the pop-up flash combined with high ISO sensitivity makes shooting in just about any challenging lighting situation a breeze.

180-DEGREE TILTABLE LCD
Change your view with a tiltable LCD touchscreen that flips up 180-degrees without sacrificing compactness. Take stunning self-portraits, perfectly framed low angle shots, and incredibly precise composed pictures.

PLAYMEMORIES CAMERA APPS
Personalize your camera by adding new features of your choice with PlayMemories Camera Apps. PlayMemories Camera Apps offers a variety of apps to enhance your photos without ever needing advance photo editing skills. Choose apps for portraits, detailed close-ups, sports, time lapse, motion shot and more. Use apps that shoot, share and save photos using Wi-Fi that make it easy to control and view your camera from smartphone, and post directly to Facebook.







ADDITIONAL FEATURES

20.1 MP EXMOR HD APS SENSOR
You get incredible detail and gorgeous enlargements. Thanks to the large 20.1 megapixel APS-C sensor size and Sony Exmor APS HD CMOS technology, the camera achieves high resolution images with no penalty in low-light sensitivity or sensor noise.

AUTO OBJECT FRAMING FILLS THE FRAME WITH YOUR SUBJECT
Give your photos a professional look with Auto Object Framing. Featuring advancements like exceptional two-person portrait capability along with Face Detection and Tracking Focus, Auto Object Framing not only turns ordinary photos into stunning compositions but does so automatically recognizing the scene then cropping accordingly.

CONVENIENT POWER ZOOM LENS W/ MOTOR ZOOM LEVER AND BODY CONTROL
A convenient zoom lever on the body of the camera allows for effortless one-handed operation and smooth zooming even when shooting self-portraits, bringing compact camera convenience to the realm of interchangeable-lens models.

COMPACT, EASY-TO-CARRY PZ 16-50MM KIT LENS
For the ultimate in portability, the a5000 includes the collapsible 16-50mm power zoom (SELP1650) as the kit lens. Ideal when traveling or anytime a compact, lightweight camera-combo is desired.

COMPATIBLE WITH SONY'S E-MOUNT LENS SYSTEM
To take advantage of its lightweight on-the-go body, the α5000 is compatible with Sony’s E-mount lens system and expanded line of E-mount compact and lightweight lenses - perfect for the traveler or street photographer.

PICTURE EFFECT MODES

The a5000 includes 17 effects that can be applied to photos or movies, giving you the means to vastly expand your artistic repertoire. The ability to view effects in real-time on the LCD screen11 before the shot lets you experiment with different looks until you are satisfied with the result.

PHOTO CREATIVITY FEATURE

The a5000 provides easy access to Picture Effect settings as well as controls for Background Defocus, Brightness, Color and Vividness. Just activate Photo Creativity, choose the appropriate item then adjust while viewing in real-time on the LCD screen. The ability to combine settings offers nearly unlimited creative control, and lets you compensate for tricky lighting.

SUPERIOR AUTO MODE
Use Superior Auto mode to shoot photos and movies with the ease of a compact digital camera. In this mode, the camera recognizes the current shooting environment then adjusts settings for optimal results. Superior Auto also includes Auto HDR and Hand-held Twilight modes, both of which employ image compositing technology to handle difficult lighting by recording multiple images at high speed then compositing them to produce the final photo.

ANTI-MOTION BLUR MODE
Corrects for subject movement to capture amazingly clean and sharp images in low light. The camera leverages the large, APS-C image sensor and captures six images in a fraction of a second. Combining the data from all six creates a single image that minimizes subject blur.

HAND-HELD TWILIGHT MODE
Get cleaner and sharper nighttime pictures—beyond the capability of traditional cameras—without using flash or a tripod. The camera leverages the large, APS-C image sensor and captures six images in a fraction of a second. Combining the data from all six creates a single image of extraordinary detail and low noise.

FACE DETECTION/SMILE SHUTTER
Set the a5000 to recognize faces and smiles. Face Detection locates up to eight faces in a composition then adjusts exposure, white balance and other settings based on these faces. Smile Shutter — adjustable in three levels — automatically takes a shot when smiles in the scene are detected.

CREATIVE STYLE
Tailor the look of photos and movies before shooting. Choose from one of seven settings — Standard, Vivid, Portrait, Landscape, Sunset or Black & White — depending on the scene or your creative intent.

SPEED PRIORITY CONTINUOUS MODE
Freeze fast-moving subjects by shooting at up to 4 fps. This is the ideal solution for photographing sports, children at play or other action.

UP TO 420 SHOTS6 OF BATTERY LIFE
Take up to 420 shots on a single charge with Sony lithium ion Stamina battery power. Sony's InfoLITHIUM battery system enables you to see the percent of power remaining, so you can keep shooting in confidence.

PLAYMEMORIES HOME SUPPLIED SOFTWARE10
Free, easy-to-use PlayMemories Home image management software automatically installs onto Windows PC's for Sony Digital Camera users. Download photos and movies onto your computer then view, organize, edit, retouch, print, burn to disk, share or upload to social networking websites.10

SUPPLIED ACCESSORIES
The kit includes a NP-FW50 Lithium ion rechargeable battery, AC-UB10 USB AC charger (in-camera battery charging), Mini-B USB cable, and shoulder strap.




INNOVATION FROM EVERY ANGLE

4. Records in 29 minute segments.

6. Actual performance varies based on settings, environmental conditions, and usage. Battery capacity decreases over time and use.

9. Auto Focus function available with Sony E-Mount lenses and Sony A-mount SSM and SAM series lenses when using LA-EA2/EA4 lens adaptor.

10. Files compatible with iMovie '09 or later on Mac. Software not compatible with Mac OS X.

11. Among interchangeable-lens cameras with an APS-C sensor and built-in flash as of February 2013.

12. The following modes are not displayed in real-time and cannot be applied to movies: HDR Painting, Rich-tone Monochrome, Soft Focus and Miniature.
